Add and Update Insight

POST /agents/add-edit-insights

Update list of insights

Example Request

Headers

apikey

Request Body

{

“insightsID”:[“6180bd4dc7dd291d592f3918”], “agentID”: “6180bae8d7ba18b5e895b4c8”

}
